title: Your Shop Reset
body: I already send in a support ticket for this, but I was wondering, if I bought a skin from my new set and requested for the old set after, would I still be able to get my old discounts and keep the one skin from the new discounts?{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: We should be able to help out in the ticket as long as you opened the shop when it was up the first time ^_^!

Ya I did. But I was wondering what would happen if I bought a skin from the second set of discounts after requesting my discounts to be put back. Like would it not be able to reset? Would that skin I bought be refunded automatically? Will I keep the skin? xD Thanks

The offers you have now are the offers that will stay until the shop ends. You need to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) telling us which of the old offers you wanted as well. You're free to buy any of the new offers and you'll keep them.

Can I get my old/1st Your Shop from before can I pleas have mine reset to the old one too? 
The Chemtech Tryndamere was 487 or around 490
No worries! We can make that happen but you'll need to have the RP on your account first. Reply to this message once you have the RP and I can get it done for ya ^_^!
Hi. Can I see what offers did I had first time, please? I bought one skin from the second offer but I want to know if I can buy something from the first one too.

You can absolutely buy something from the first set of offers, but do please keep in mind that those first offers won't be available if you never clicked on them yourself. If you did, reach out to the EU agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help out! We only have access to the NA/OCE accounts here on NA boards =\ .
